column4: look carefully at the syntax for usermod, im sure you got removed from the admin group
id dthacker does not show me in admin.  How can I restore without sudo?
most likely youll have to reboot on a livecd and edit /etc/group on your root partition, unless you have another user that has sudo privildges, or if you created a root password
nickrud: thanks, I'll have to go to the the hosting site tomorrow.
